title: Breaking down the question
text: Find out the diameter of an atom and divide the length of cell membrane with that value

title: Sub-questions
text: What is the length of an atom? (2 times the diameter of a hydrogen atom $$=$$ $$2$$ * $$2$$ times the radius of a hydrogen atom) Write your answer in scientific notation

title: Sub-questions
text: What is the length of a cell membrane?

title: Combining
text: How many atoms thick is a cell membrane? (Divide length of cell membrane by length of each atom)
